entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Comment block conflicts with string content #61168
  • StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException: This program location is thought to be unreachable. #61165
  • IDE0055 report incorrectly on region define in pragma #61163
  • Not generating empty source, when last syntax node is deleted in Visual Studio 2022 #61162
  • `Replace method with property` refactoring sometimes eats new line #61161
  • Cleanup on save when fixing merge conflicts removes ALL usings #61159

Closed

  • SyntaxTree generated XML document comments attribute params source text incorrect #60884

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve performance of SourceText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Properly create virtual-char sequences for raw-string-literals #61157
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Feedback about ASP.Net ExternalAccess PR #61152
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix assertion failure for optional VB attribute with invalid type #60924
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Fix XmlTextAttribute space normalization #61012
    Area-Compilers, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #61158
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.2 #61147
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update light bulb workarounds to apply through 17.2 Preview 6 #61151
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove extra new line character from end of file #61056
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Support smart escaping of text when pasting into string expressions (part2). #61111
    Area-IDE
  • Generate Variable: parameter does not get introduced prior to optional parameters/params parameter #61138
    Area-IDE
  • Treat some nint/nuint conversions as standard conversions #61034
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int, 17.3
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Handle some possible null-references #61132
    Area-Compilers
  • Bump RichNav timeout to 260 min #60909
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove unused private members #61064
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Require overriding all accessors #61114
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC #61032
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • RazorLineFormattingOptions #61054
    Area-IDE
  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
